amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding payment reductions under the Medicare physician fee schedule.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1085 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1085 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S8681, S8685; text: CR S8685) To express the sense of the Senate regarding payment reductions under the Medicare physician fee schedule.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1085 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Specter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1085 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
